title: 82/428/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 June 1982 establishing that the 'EMI - UV and Solar Blind Photomultiplier Tube, model G 26 E 314 LF' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 21 June 1982
establishing that the 'EMI - UV and Solar Blind Photomultiplier Tube, model G 26 E 314 LF' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/428/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The 'EMI - UV and Solar Blind Photomultiplier Tube, model G 26 E 314 LF', which is subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 11 December 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 June 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 134, 31. 5. 1979, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
